  18  /**
  19   * external API for core library
  20   *
  21   * @package    core_webservice
  22   * @category   external
  23   * @copyright  2012 Jerome Mouneyrac <jerome@moodle.com>
  24   * @license    http://www.gnu.org/copyleft/gpl.html GNU GPL v3 or later
  25   */
  26  
  27  defined('MOODLE_INTERNAL') || die;
  28  
  29  require_once("$CFG->libdir/externallib.php");
  30  
  31  /**
  32   * Web service related functions
  33   *
  34   * @package    core
  35   * @category   external
  36   * @copyright  2012 Jerome Mouneyrac <jerome@moodle.com>
  37   * @license    http://www.gnu.org/copyleft/gpl.html GNU GPL v3 or later
  38   * @since Moodle 2.4
  39   */
  40  class core_external extends external_api {
  41  
  42  
  43      /**
  44       * Format the received string parameters to be sent to the core get_string() function.
  45       *
  46       * @param array $stringparams
  47       * @return object|string
  48       * @since Moodle 2.4
  49       */
  50      public static function format_string_parameters($stringparams) {
  51          // Check if there are some string params.
  52          $strparams = new stdClass();
  53          if (!empty($stringparams)) {
  54              // There is only one string parameter.
  55              if (count($stringparams) == 1) {
  56                  $stringparam = array_pop($stringparams);
  57                  if (isset($stringparam['name'])) {
  58                      $strparams->{$stringparam['name']} = $stringparam['value'];
  59                  } else {
  60                      // It is a not named string parameter.
  61                      $strparams = $stringparam['value'];
  62                  }
  63              }  else {
  64                  // There are more than one parameter.
  65                  foreach ($stringparams as $stringparam) {
  66  
  67                      // If a parameter is unnamed throw an exception
  68                      // unnamed param is only possible if one only param is sent.
  69                      if (empty($stringparam['name'])) {
  70                          throw new moodle_exception('unnamedstringparam', 'webservice');
  71                      }
  72  
  73                      $strparams->{$stringparam['name']} = $stringparam['value'];
  74                  }
  75              }
  76          }
  77          return $strparams;
  78      }
  79  
  80      /**
  81       * Can this function be called directly from ajax?
  82       *
  83       * @return boolean
  84       * @since Moodle 2.9
  85       */
  86      public static function get_string_is_allowed_from_ajax() {
  87          return true;
  88      }
  89  
  90      /**
  91       * Returns description of get_string parameters
  92       *
  93       * @return external_function_parameters
  94       * @since Moodle 2.4
  95       */
  96      public static function get_string_parameters() {
  97          return new external_function_parameters(
  98              array('stringid' => new external_value(PARAM_STRINGID, 'string identifier'),
  99                    'component' => new external_value(PARAM_COMPONENT,'component', VALUE_DEFAULT, 'moodle'),
 100                    'lang' => new external_value(PARAM_LANG, 'lang', VALUE_DEFAULT, null),
 101                    'stringparams' => new external_multiple_structure (
 102                        new external_single_structure(array(
 103                            'name' => new external_value(PARAM_ALPHANUMEXT, 'param name
 104                              - if the string expect only one $a parameter then don\'t send this field, just send the value.', VALUE_OPTIONAL),
 105                            'value' => new external_value(PARAM_TEXT,'param value'))),
 106                            'the definition of a string param (i.e. {$a->name})', VALUE_DEFAULT, array()
 107                     )
 108              )
 109          );
 110      }
 111  
 112      /**
 113       * Return a core get_string() call
 114       *
 115       * @param string $identifier string identifier
 116       * @param string $component string component
 117       * @param array $stringparams the string params
 118       * @return string
 119       * @since Moodle 2.4
 120       */
 121      public static function get_string($stringid, $component = 'moodle', $lang = null, $stringparams = array()) {
 122          $params = self::validate_parameters(self::get_string_parameters(),
 123                        array('stringid'=>$stringid, 'component' => $component, 'lang' => $lang, 'stringparams' => $stringparams));
 124  
 125          $stringmanager = get_string_manager();
 126          return $stringmanager->get_string($params['stringid'], $params['component'],
 127              core_external::format_string_parameters($params['stringparams']), $params['lang']);
 128      }
 129  
 130      /**
 131       * Returns description of get_string() result value
 132       *
 133       * @return string
 134       * @since Moodle 2.4
 135       */
 136      public static function get_string_returns() {
 137          return new external_value(PARAM_TEXT, 'translated string');
 138      }
 139  
 140      /**
 141       * Returns description of get_string parameters
 142       *
 143       * @return external_function_parameters
 144       * @since Moodle 2.4
 145       */
 146      public static function get_strings_parameters() {
 147          return new external_function_parameters(
 148              array('strings' => new external_multiple_structure (
 149                      new external_single_structure (array(
 150                          'stringid' => new external_value(PARAM_STRINGID, 'string identifier'),
 151                          'component' => new external_value(PARAM_COMPONENT, 'component', VALUE_DEFAULT, 'moodle'),
 152                          'lang' => new external_value(PARAM_LANG, 'lang', VALUE_DEFAULT, null),
 153                          'stringparams' => new external_multiple_structure (
 154                              new external_single_structure(array(
 155                                  'name' => new external_value(PARAM_ALPHANUMEXT, 'param name
 156                                      - if the string expect only one $a parameter then don\'t send this field, just send the value.', VALUE_OPTIONAL),
 157                                  'value' => new external_value(PARAM_TEXT, 'param value'))),
 158                                  'the definition of a string param (i.e. {$a->name})', VALUE_DEFAULT, array()
 159                          ))
 160                      )
 161                  )
 162              )
 163          );
 164      }
 165  
 166      /**
 167       * Can this function be called directly from ajax?
 168       *
 169       * @return boolean
 170       * @since Moodle 2.9
 171       */
 172      public static function get_strings_is_allowed_from_ajax() {
 173          return true;
 174      }
 175  
 176  
 177      /**
 178       * Return multiple call to core get_string()
 179       *
 180       * @param array $strings strings to translate
 181       * @return array
 182       *
 183       * @since Moodle 2.4
 184       */
 185      public static function get_strings($strings) {
 186          $params = self::validate_parameters(self::get_strings_parameters(),
 187                        array('strings'=>$strings));
 188          $stringmanager = get_string_manager();
 189  
 190          $translatedstrings = array();
 191          foreach($params['strings'] as $string) {
 192  
 193              if (!empty($string['lang'])) {
 194                  $lang = $string['lang'];
 195              } else {
 196                  $lang = current_language();
 197              }
 198  
 199              $translatedstrings[] = array(
 200                  'stringid' => $string['stringid'],
 201                  'component' => $string['component'],
 202                  'lang' => $lang,
 203                  'string' => $stringmanager->get_string($string['stringid'], $string['component'],
 204                      core_external::format_string_parameters($string['stringparams']), $lang));
 205          }
 206  
 207          return $translatedstrings;
 208      }
 209  
 210      /**
 211       * Returns description of get_string() result value
 212       *
 213       * @return array
 214       * @since Moodle 2.4
 215       */
 216      public static function get_strings_returns() {
 217          return new external_multiple_structure(
 218              new external_single_structure(array(
 219                  'stringid' => new external_value(PARAM_STRINGID, 'string id'),
 220                  'component' => new external_value(PARAM_COMPONENT, 'string component'),
 221                  'lang' => new external_value(PARAM_LANG, 'lang'),
 222                  'string' => new external_value(PARAM_TEXT, 'translated string'))
 223              ));
 224      }
 225  
 226       /**
 227       * Returns description of get_component_strings parameters
 228       *
 229       * @return external_function_parameters
 230       * @since Moodle 2.4
 231       */
 232      public static function get_component_strings_parameters() {
 233          return new external_function_parameters(
 234              array('component' => new external_value(PARAM_COMPONENT, 'component'),
 235                    'lang' => new external_value(PARAM_LANG, 'lang', VALUE_DEFAULT, null),
 236              )
 237          );
 238      }
 239  
 240      /**
 241       * Can this function be called directly from ajax?
 242       *
 243       * @return boolean
 244       * @since Moodle 2.9
 245       */
 246      public static function get_component_strings_is_allowed_from_ajax() {
 247          return true;
 248      }
 249  
 250      /**
 251       * Return all lang strings of a component - call to core get_component_strings().
 252       *
 253       * @param string $component component name
 254       * @return array
 255       *
 256       * @since Moodle 2.4
 257       */
 258      public static function get_component_strings($component, $lang = null) {
 259  
 260          if (empty($lang)) {
 261              $lang = current_language();
 262          }
 263  
 264          $params = self::validate_parameters(self::get_component_strings_parameters(),
 265                        array('component'=>$component, 'lang' => $lang));
 266  
 267          $stringmanager = get_string_manager();
 268  
 269          $wsstrings = array();
 270          $componentstrings = $stringmanager->load_component_strings($params['component'], $params['lang']);
 271          foreach($componentstrings as $stringid => $string) {
 272              $wsstring = array();
 273              $wsstring['stringid'] = $stringid;
 274              $wsstring['string'] = $string;
 275              $wsstrings[] = $wsstring;
 276          }
 277  
 278          return $wsstrings;
 279      }
 280  
 281      /**
 282       * Returns description of get_component_strings() result value
 283       *
 284       * @return array
 285       * @since Moodle 2.4
 286       */
 287      public static function get_component_strings_returns() {
 288          return new external_multiple_structure(
 289              new external_single_structure(array(
 290                  'stringid' => new external_value(PARAM_STRINGID, 'string id'),
 291                  'string' => new external_value(PARAM_RAW, 'translated string'))
 292              ));
 293      }
 294  }
